title: Washer & Dryer, Dishwasher, Hardwood-Like Flooring
posting_body: Harbor Oaks Apartments in Steilacoom, WASurrounded by natural beauty and history, Harbor Oaks sits in the heart of Steilacoom, Washingtons first incorporated city.
Harbor Oaks offers spacious and beautifully designed one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes with craftsman style finishes, and details that count.
The Steilacoom Ferry Terminal is just minutes from the community, and the public beaches and endless coastal views make living here a pleasure year-round.
Along with excellent schools, nearby shopping malls, and access to major cultural and economic centers like Tacoma, you couldnt ask for a more idyllic setting and the perfect community to call home.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
